web-api-development.title: Web API Development
web-api-development.subtitle: Secure, observable APIs designed for real production workloads.
web-api-development.lead: Design, build, and document secure REST and GraphQL APIs with authentication, logging, and observability built in.
web-api-development.description: We build APIs that are boring in the best way: predictable, secure, well-documented, and easy to operate. Our focus is long-term maintainability, versioning strategy, and operational visibility so your systems scale without surprises.

features.title: Authentication & Authorization

features.title: Observability
features.text: Structured logging, metrics, tracing, and production-grade monitoring.

features.title: Documentation
features.text: Auto-generated API docs and onboarding guides for internal and external consumers.
